author: fnathan
title: Chicago Fire’s Bastian Schweinsteiger asked if he can win the WORLD CUP with new side by confused US reporter
text:
EFL cringing in chicago Chicago Fire’s Bastian Schweinsteiger asked if he can win the WORLD CUP with new side by confused US reporter 
In a bizarre moment at his unveiling press conference, it was thought the former Manchester United man can win the ultimate international prize By Fred Nathan 29th March 2017, 10:00   10:23 pm
